long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ESL Helper Extension aims to provide a constant learning environment at school or even at home for beginner English learners, boosting education in communities which have a very significant immigrant population. 

Specifically, the app targets elementary and middle school students who may be struggling with their English learning, or even starting to learn English as a second language.
